```{r}

```

```{r}
data <- dataexample_d
head(data)
tail(data)
```

```{r}
set.seed(123)
system.time(out <- pte_d(
  sob = data$sob, yob = data$yob, aob = data$aob, 
  var = TRUE, conf.int = TRUE, rep = 1000))
out
```
